content:
I love everything in our tent right now,
Even though it's not fancy or expensive,
Just looking at it all makes me happy.
info: 幻雪关于新居的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Speaking of personal style,
one can observe it quite clearly in how we decorate our spaces.
info: 幻雪关于新居的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Do you ever reorganize your furniture?
Even though there isn't much space in my tent,
I simply can't help moving the small tables and chairs around~
info: 幻雪关于新居的闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
